i read autobiographies before bed.
my favorite thing to do is float the river.

participant_2.background:
I prefer to live in the suburbs so I can have a backyard for my dogs.
i ride my bicycle everywhere.
I'm a creative teacher who loves to ride my moped and share my passion for writing with my students.
i enjoy hiking and riding my bicycle.
i enjoy writing for long periods of time.

content.text: Hello! How are you doing today?
I'm doing great! Just got back from a walk with my dog, and I'm looking forward to teaching her some new tricks! How was your day?
My day was pretty good! I went for a hike with my dogs, and then came home and spent some time writing.
That sounds like a great way to spend the day! I love hiking, but I don't have any dogs. Do you have any pets?
Yes, I have two dogs! A golden retriever and a black lab. They're the best companions I could ask for.
They sound like they're a lot of fun! I've always wanted a dog, but I'm not sure if I have the time to properly take care of one.
It definitely takes some work, but it's worth it in the end. Dogs are such loyal and loving creatures.
I can see why you love your dogs so much! They sound like they're great pets.
They are! I'm so glad I have them in my life.
I'm sure they're glad to have you in theirs too!
It's been great chatting with you! I hope we can talk again soon!
It's been great chatting with you too! Have a great day!
